ai-ja363:1.3_0: without working for the eons of work.
ai-ja363:2.1_0: You should only say what you would do;
ai-ja363:2.2_0: you shouldn’t say what you wouldn’t do.
ai-ja363:3.1_0: He who is a friend should always be heedful,
ai-ja363:3.4_0: A friend should not be cut off from the others.
ai-ja363:4.3_0: they develop the fruits of the fruit.
ai-ja363:5.1_0: Having drunk the nectar of seclusion
ai-ja363:5.3_0: free of stress, free of evil,
